stimulusHtml: Historians have connected the growing lack of confidence in an objective view of nature seen among many late-nineteenth and early-twentieth-century intellectuals most directly to which of the following?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of progress and modernity in the late nineteenth century.

choicesHtml: Advances in theoretical physics such as relativity theory and quantum physics
The growing popularity of Marxist socialism
Increasing influence of non-European cultures on European art
The expansion of government support for scientific and technical research
